request.description: Delete a payment profile using the profile ID, also known as the customer code.
Create a new payment profile using either a card or a Legato token.
Get a payment profile using the profile ID, also known as the Customer Code.
Get all of the cards on the profile.
Delete a card on the profile.
Add a card to the profile.
Update the details of a card on the profile.
